text: Kim Bo-kyung (3 April 1976 - 2 February 2021) was a South Korean actress. She began acting in 1995. She was known for her roles in Friend (2001), Epitaph (2007), Paju (2009) and The Day He Arrives (2011). Kim died on 2 February 2021 from liver cancer in Busan at the age of 44. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Actors from Busan Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:Cancer deaths in South Korea Category:Deaths from liver cancer
title: Kim Bo-kyung (actress)
